channel.title: 508 server help!
channel.description: [b]Hey guys, I followed stormcutter's tutorial on how to make a 508 server and it worked perfectly but how do others join? Also, which one is better? I have JDK 5.0, is JDK 6.7 going to help me server more? Please help me with these questions I would really appreciate it! Thank you.[/b]

the ip changer is for 508 so just look inside the 508 download section

item.title: 508 server help!
item.dc:creator: @Full_metal_jacket Full metal jacket
item.description:
@Full_metal_jacket wrote:

You need the people that you want to join have to 1st:

1)download a 508 client that you have the IP changed to yours so ppl can get on
2)you must change the ip in the clients folder

TO CHANGE THE IP:

1)open up client.java inside your client folder
2)find 127.0.0.1
3)change it to whatever your ip is
4)save and compile

IF YOU DONT HAVE A CLIENT.JAVA

you need what is called a IP CHANGER, you can serch it and you will find one. their preatty straight forward to use.

And the JKD 6.7 would be better

Read full topic
